title: Slow Cooker Lasagna Recipe
description: This crockpot lasagna is simple to make by layering a hearty ground beef and tomato sauce with lasagna noodles and 3 cheeses in the slow cooker.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Main Dishes Pasta Lasagna Recipes Meat Lasagna Recipes Slow Cooker Lasagna 4.5 (1,063) 817 Reviews 103 Photos This crockpot lasagna recipe is so easy, you might think that you missed something. It is a delicious slow cooker meal! Submitted by Kim Updated on July 8, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 103 103 103 103 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 4 hrs 10 mins Total Time: 4 hrs 30 mins Servings: 10 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 10 servings 1 pound lean ground beef 1 medium onion, chopped 2 teaspoons minced garlic 1 (29 ounce) can tomato sauce 1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste 1 ½ teaspoons salt 1 teaspoon dried oregano 16 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese 12 ounces cottage cheese ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese 1 (12 ounce) package lasagna noodles Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook ground beef, onion, and garlic in a large skillet over medium heat until the meat is browned. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Add tomato sauce, tomato paste, salt, and oregano and stir until well combined and heated through. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir mozzarella, cottage cheese, and Parmesan together in a large bowl. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spoon a layer of the meat mixture onto the bottom of a slow cooker. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Add a double layer of uncooked lasagna noodles, breaking noodles to fit into cooker as needed. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Top noodles with a portion of cheese mixture. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Repeat the layering of sauce, noodles, and cheese until all the ingredients are used. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cover and cook on Low until lasagna noodles are tender, about 4 to 6 hours. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 1,960 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 446 Calories 20g Fat 36g Carbs 31g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 10 Calories 446 % Daily Value * Total Fat 20g 26% Saturated Fat 10g 51% Cholesterol 72mg 24% Sodium 1420mg 62% Total Carbohydrate 36g 13% Dietary Fiber 3g 11% Total Sugars 8g Protein 31g 62% Vitamin C 11mg 12% Calcium 453mg 35% Iron 3mg 19% Potassium 715mg 15% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Slow Cooker Lasagna 01 of 103 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 103 Photo by  Clhlcl2k16 01/13/2025 A keeper! Easy to follow Worth the effort Family favorite I added more flavours to the meat and a bit less sauce as I hate when it pours out everywhere but other then that it was great. 03 of 103 Photo by  Maria Cartagena 09/03/2024 A keeper! Easy to follow Worth the effort Great flavors This was the best lasagna I ever made. It came out very good. Easy to follow receipe. 04 of 103 Photo by  jeffplant3 07/22/2024 Was my first attempt at lasagna ever. Slow cooker method seemed to be the way to go regardless of the learning curve. I wasn't disappointed. Breaking the noodles to fit in a round slow cooker was fun. Lots of bits and pieces at the end but just used them all up in the final layer. Might consider doing a mirepoix for the sauce next time adding it back in after the meat is browned and some Italian seasoning for more flavour. Just preference. Have to make sure you let it rest for about 20 minutes after you remove from the heat. Otherwise it all worked. Thumbs up from everybody! 05 of 103 Photo by  DizzyTaro1495 11/30/2023 I really like this lasagna recipe.The only thing I changed was I added ricotta instead of cottage cheese because I like the taste better. I would’ve taken an after picture, but it was gone so fast. 👍 06 of 103 Photo by  EagerPeel4649 06/15/2023 I used Turkey no beef! Did not cook the meat before. Let it just cook all together! Added cottage cheese. 07 of 103 Photo by  Tone McCoy-Blaine 12/24/2022 Maybe add a little bit of water and sugar to cut down on the tart taste of the tomatoes. I added diced tomatoes to my mix. And I used Ricotta along with the cottage cheese. 08 of 103 Photo by  Rick Brown 11/24/2022 Pretty good. I reduced the salt to 1 tsp based on other reviews, and it was still a little too salty. Next time I might leave it out altogether. I'm not sure that the parmesan adds much - I may leave that out next time too, but I wonder if that's where some of the saltiness comes from. Cooking it in a crock pot makes any level of neatness impossible when plating, but I and my kids didn't care. If it was just for me, I'd add some crushed red pepper flakes, but my kids don't like spicy. Also, I was short on time so I cooked it on high for two hours. It was a little bit burnt on the edges, but only a little, and I didn't mind the added crunch LOL! 09 of 103 Photo by  John 08/22/2022 It was ok. Not sure why everything is mixed together unlike a pan lasagna. Lost some flavor. Next time I would do it different.Btw...slow cooker on high for 2 hours. Noodles were fine 10 of 103 Photo by  9virgo9dm 02/07/2022 Made this today. It could have been spicer. I didn't add any salt but, very easy to make and good. 😘❤ 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Classic and Simple Meat Lasagna 233 Ratings Easy Lasagna with Uncooked Noodles 571 Ratings Easy Lasagna 1,189 Ratings Homemade Lasagna 390 Ratings Grammy's Overnight Lasagna 83 Ratings Cheesy Vegetable Lasagna 216 Ratings Easy Spaghetti Pie 497 Ratings Sarah's Chicken Lasagna 35 Ratings Mexican Lasagna with Noodles 273 Ratings Leftover Spaghetti Lasagna 70 Ratings Instant Pot Lasagna 29 Ratings American Lasagna 2,736 Ratings Skillet Lasagna 4 Ratings Spaghetti Pie 90 Ratings Baked Ziti IV 1,262 Ratings Simple Spinach Lasagna 560 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
